overview: Americans come west to California in the hope of peaceful settlement. Roy and Gabby sing a duet: "We're Not Coming Out Tonight." Other songs include "Sundown on the Rangeland" and "Ride on Vaquero."
tagline: Rollicking Roy, hard-riding, straight-shootin' son of the saddle, finds romance in the lawless hills of old Mexico!
title: In Old Caliente
